title: 03/07/22 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 03/07/22 DPS Best Of
description:
On today’s Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to Jay Bilas about Coach K’s legacy at Duke. He proposes a radical new idea for shortening games in the MLB. And Mike Tannenbaum explains how he’d go about acquiring Tom Brady if he were the Niners.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
